name: Greek Yogurt and Strawberry Phyllo Cups
description: These flaky cups are an elegant way to serve fruit and yogurt at brunch

recipeInstructions.text: Place oven rack in upper middle position and preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 12-well muffin tin tray. Lay one sheet phyllo dough on a clean work surface. Brush all over with butter. Lay second sheet over phyllo on top and brush with butter. Cut into 12 squares. Place in prepared muffin tin. Butter a remaining sheet of phyllo and top it with final sheet. Brush all over with butter and cut into 12 squares. Place a square in each muffin tin, alternating corner points with first square. Bake until phyllo is golden, about 6 minutes.
Let phyllo cups cool to room temperature. Fill each cup with about 1 1/2 tablespoons Greek yogurt and top with 1 tablespoon strawberries. Drizzle each cup with honey.
